rows.label: qst001501_msg001
rows.name: ああ　ここだけの話なんだがな

rows.label: qst001501_msg002
rows.name:
こないだ帝国軍が捕らえたスパイが
入手した極秘情報をモンスターに
くくりつけて逃がしちまったらしいんだ

rows.label: qst001501_msg004
rows.name: ものすごい報酬金が懸けられてんだよ

rows.label: qst001501_msg005
rows.name:
そのモンスターをとっ捕まえて
極秘情報が書かれたブツを
詰め所に届けりゃしばらく遊び放題だぜ！

rows.label: qst001501_msg006
rows.name: なんて聞こう？

rows.label: qst001501_msg007
rows.name: 仕事はしなくていいのか尋ねる

rows.label: qst001501_msg008
rows.name: そんなに休みたいのか尋ねる

rows.label: qst001501_msg009
rows.name: どちらの選択肢を選んでもセリフは変わらない

rows.label: qst001501_msg010
rows.name:
傭兵の仕事は危険なものが多くてよ
やれ要人の護衛だ　やれモンスター退治だ

rows.label: qst001501_msg011
rows.name:
そんなんばっかやらされてんだ
たまにはゆっくり休んだって
バチはあたんねぇだろ

rows.label: qst001501_msg012
rows.name:
っつーわけで探してんだが[ML:Dash ]
これがなかなか大変でな

rows.label: qst001501_msg013
rows.name:
群れの中に混ざっちまって
どいつが持ってるかさっぱりわかんねぇんだ

rows.label: qst001501_msg014
rows.name:
一度団に戻って調べてもらえりゃ
すぐにわかるのかもしんねぇが[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst001501_msg015
rows.name:
そうすっと報酬が独り占めできねぇからな
相談するのは最後の手段だな

rows.label: qst001501_msg016
rows.name:
手強い相手だが必ず捕まえて
報酬金をがっぽりいただくぜ！

rows.label: qst001501_msg017
rows.name:
おっといけねぇ
早くしねぇと他の奴らに先を越されちまう

rows.label: qst001501_msg018
rows.name:
んじゃ　俺は行かせてもらうぜ
あばよ！

rows.label: qst001501_msg0002
rows.name:
Well met, fellows!
And have I got news for you!

rows.label: qst001501_msg0003
rows.name:
So the Imperial Army recently caught
a spy. A spy who'd stolen some
top-secret intelligence.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0004
rows.name:
Question time! Where do you think
they hid it?

rows.label: qst001501_msg0005
rows.name: Where do we think it's hidden?

rows.label: qst001501_msg0006
rows.name: Buried in the ground

rows.label: qst001501_msg0007
rows.name: Inside their stomach

rows.label: qst001501_msg0008
rows.name: In the Cloud Sea

rows.label: qst001501_msg0009
rows.name: Nuh-uh.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0010
rows.name:
Though it might have been better
in the long run...

rows.label: qst001501_msg0011
rows.name:
Made it so that only a salvager could
get to it?

rows.label: qst001501_msg0012
rows.name: Interesting, but no.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0013
rows.name:
The spy, without the time to hide the
documents properly, put them in a
steel box and fed them to a monster.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0014
rows.name: Now that's food for thought!

rows.label: qst001501_msg0016
rows.name: An excellent guess!

rows.label: qst001501_msg0017
rows.name:
Oh, but not inside their own stomach.
A monster's stomach.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0018
rows.name:
Put the documents in a steel box,
then, gulp!

rows.label: qst001501_msg0019
rows.name:
And that monster was a, drumroll,
Noog Skeeter!

rows.label: qst001501_msg0020
rows.name:
Only thing is, you know how freely
those monsters fly across the
Superbian skies...

rows.label: qst001501_msg0021
rows.name:
The Noog Skeeter that swallowed the
documents got mixed in with the flock
and now we don't know which one it is!

rows.label: qst001501_msg0022
rows.name:
There's a pretty big prize riding on it,
but taking down even one is a process...
Cost, benefit, y'know?

rows.label: qst001501_msg0023
rows.name:
Anyhoo, that's the story. A request of
big effort, no takers.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0025
rows.name:
Eh, if you feel like doing it, I'm not
gonna stop you.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0026
rows.name:
Defeat the Noog Skeeters and
recover the documents...

rows.label: qst001501_msg0027
rows.name:
then hand them over to the soldier
at the Hadashal Palace gatehouse
to get your reward.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0029
rows.name: Oh, yeah...

rows.label: qst001501_msg0030
rows.name:
You might be able to tell which
Noog Skeeter swallowed
the documents.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0031
rows.name:
With that thing in its stomach, it might
be feeling a wee bit crabbit.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0032
rows.name:
Ah, but you might have to be watching
for a pretty long time...

rows.label: qst001501_msg0101
rows.name:
Hey-oh, you still doing that job
I told you about before?

rows.label: qst001501_msg0102
rows.name:
Defeat the Noog Skeeters and
recover the documents...

rows.label: qst001501_msg0103
rows.name:
then hand them over to the soldier
in the Hadashal Palace gatehouse
to get your reward.

rows.label: qst001501_msg0104
rows.name: Best of luck!
